welcomeToSubText: Your journey begins here. Discover the best car rental experience with us.
easyBookingSubText: Find and book your perfect car in just a few taps. Convenience at your fingertips.
enjoyTheRideSubText: Pick up your car and hit the road. We're here to ensure a smooth ride.
noCarsBasedOnBrand: Based on your current selection, there are no available vehicles in our inventory at this time.
loginRequiredContent: To complete your booking and reserve your desired car, please log in to your account. If you don't have an account yet, you can easily create one in a few steps.
forgetPasswordBody: Enter the email associated with your account and weâ€™ll send an email with instructions to reset your password.
createNewPasswordBody: Your new password must be different from previous used passwords.
selectYourLang: Hello! Pick your language to continue.
